instructions: Tap Following, then tap the search field. Enter any of the following: The name of a channel, such as CNN or Washington Post A topic, such as fashion, business, or politics A story, such as the rescue of a baby elephant

On your Android phone or tablet, open your device's Settings. Tap Apps , Manage Apps , or Application Manager . Tap Google Play Movies & TV . Tap Storage and then Clear cache . Try replaying your video.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Movies & TV app . Tap Download . Tip: For more information on downloading videos to your device, go to Watch Movies and TV offline .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Movies & TV app . Tap Library . Next to the video that isn't playing correctly, tap the red check mark .
On your Android phone or tablet, open your device's Settings. Tap Apps , Manage Apps , or Application Manager . Tap Google Play Movies & TV app . Tap Storage and then Clear cache .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Movies & TV app . Find the video you want to watch. Next to the video, tap Download .
